room_title: Escape room "The Bank Heist" by Escape Room 207 in Brunswick
room_description:
Your highly trained team of thieves specializes in safe cracking, and we have an important job for you. Today, youâ€™ll be facing your greatest challenge yet, as you and your team attempt a heist at the Topsham Savings and Trust. The security system will be down for 55 minutes, and then you will have just 5 minutes to escape before law enforcement arrives.
If you do manage to enter the vault, you will have to make a crucial decision: take the available money and run, or stay just a little longer to try to significantly increase your take.
